remarks: Adjoint of double composition of projections.  Generalization of special case of Theorem 3.11(viii) of [Beran] p. 106.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Dec-2000.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjadj2co.1 $e |- F e. CH $.
pjadj2co.2 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjadj2co.3 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjadj2coi $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( ( ( ( ( projh ` F ) o. ( projh ` G ) ) o. ( projh ` H ) ) ` A ) .ih B ) = ( A .ih ( ( ( ( projh ` H ) o. ( projh ` G ) ) o. ( projh ` F ) ) ` B ) ) ) $.
